Pro tip: think twice about bringing cofounders to early meetings with VCs.

* If only the CEO talks, it's awkward.
* If non-CEO is main person talking, VCs will wonder why they're not CEO.
* If you talk over each other a lot, it's red flag.

TL;DR little upside, lots of downside.
